snippet: Gov. Jay Nixon asserted that legislators showed a “callous disregard for women” by granting no exception for rape and incest victims.
abstract: Missouri Gov Jay Nixon vetoes legislation that would have required a 72-hour wait for women seeking abortions, asserting that legislators showed disregard for women by granting no exception for rape and incest victims.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jay Nixon asserted that legislators showed a “callous disregard for women” by granting no exception for rape and incest victims.

headline.main: Missouri: Three-Day Wait for Abortion Is Vetoed
headline.print_headline: Missouri: 3-Day Wait for Abortion Is Vetoed
